p: The outcome variable for this study is a dichotomous variable defined as “HIV testing during the visit (Yes/No).” Based on Eisenberg model of clinicians’ decision making, [ 15] we selected patient level characteristics (age, sex, race, ethnicity, source of payment, and reason of visit) and system level characteristics (seen by physician, primary care provider, ownership of facilities, practice region, metropolitan statistical area, and episode of care) as explanatory variables.
